long_description: Carry the SOL Hybrid 3 survival kit on your backcountry adventures. It covers all the basics of outdoor safety, including first aid, survival and gear repair. Kit contains four 3 x 1 in. bandages, 2 knuckle bandages, 4 butterfly bandages, one 2 in. conforming gauze bandage and two 4 x 4 in. gauze dressings. Four 2 x 2 in. sterile gauze dressings, four 3 x 3 in. sterile gauze dressings, two 4 x 3 in. non-adherent sterile dressings and 1 pair of nitrile gloves. 11 precut and shaped moleskin pieces, 1 pair of EMT shears, 5 safety pins, 3 antiseptic wipes, 1 povidone iodine, 2 triple antibiotic ointments and 1 tincture of benzoin vial. 2 After Bite wipes, two 25mg antihistamine tablets, eight 200mg ibuprofen tablets and one 10 yd. x 0.5 in. roll of medical tape. Survival tools include 2 sheets of heavy duty aluminum foil, 1 button compass, 1 fire striker, one 2-watt LED headlamp, 1 Heatsheets survival blanket and 1 signal mirror. 1 rescue whistle, 4 pieces of nylon cord and 1 Tinder Quick fire starter. Gear repair equipment includes one 50 x 2 in. roll of duct tape, three 4 in. cable ties, three 8 in. cable ties. Contents of the SOL Hybrid 3 survival kit come packaged in a convenient bag; includes a small detachable bag so you can carry only what's needed for short trips.
short_description: Carry the SOL Hybrid 3 survival kit on your backcountry adventures. It covers all the basics of outdoor safety, including first aid, survival and gear repair.
